Member Function Documentation

void IntensityModel::filterSignal ( AirFrame *  frame,
const Coord &  sendersPos,
const Coord &  receiverPos 
) [inline, virtual]

Has to be overriden by every implementation.

Filters a specified AirFrame's Signal by adding an attenuation over time to the Signal.

Parameters:
frame The incomming frame.
sendersPos The position of the frame sender.
receiverPos The position of frame receiver.

Implements AnalogueModel.
